alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:32PM PST until January 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 PM PST MONDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior, Southern Trinity, Northeastern Mendocino Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity
